properties.name: value
properties.description: The value of the progress bar: 0 to max (default 100)

properties.name: high_contrast
properties.description: Whether to render the progress bar with higher contrast color against background

properties.name: duration
properties.description:
Return a style object with the correct color and css selector.

        Args:
            color: Color of the fill part.

        Returns:
            Style: Style object with the correct css selector and color.

properties.name: fill_color
properties.description:
Return a style object with the correct color and css selector.

        Args:
            color: Color of the fill part.

        Returns:
            Style: Style object with the correct css selector and color.

styling_props.name: size
styling_props.description: The size of the progress bar: "1" | "2" | "3"

styling_props.name: variant
styling_props.description: The variant of the progress bar: "classic" | "surface" | "soft"

styling_props.name: color_scheme
styling_props.description: The color theme of the progress bar

styling_props.name: radius
styling_props.description: Override theme radius for progress bar: "none" | "small" | "medium" | "large" | "full"
